definition[0]: a solid or hollow shape that is round at one end, has sloping sides, and has a point at the other end, or something with this shape
definition[1]: an object shaped like a large cone that is put on a road to prevent cars from going somewhere or to warn drivers about something
definition[2]: the fruit of a pine or fir tree
definition[3]: a piece of thin cooked cake, shaped like a cone, that you put ice cream in, or a cone like this with ice cream in it
definition[4]: a cell in your eye that is shaped like a cone, that helps you see light and colour
